physical_appearance: The image shows a photograph in black-and-white. It is rectangular and it features a group of ten people. All of them are looking in the direction where the photograph was captured. There is a boy, who is standing at the left hand side of the photograph, while the rest are adults. All the adults, except for one man at the right hand side of the photograph at the back row, are wearing their military uniforms. The background of the photograph shows a building
title_text: Military and civil clerks of JAG Branch, HQ, ALFSEA Photography Album (donation from Anthony Robert Saint Claire)
subject_terms_1: group portraits military personnel children (people by age group)
subject_terms_2: Black-and-white photography Portrait photography Portraits, Group Soldiers Boys
